casebody.data:
[Cite as 02/1112003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-623.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

February 11, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2002-2130. State v. McKnight.

Vinton C.P. No. 01CR7230. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Vinton County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for extension of time to transmit the record,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for extension of time to transmit the record be, and hereby is, granted, and the time for transmitting the record is extended to May 12, 2003.
